programme.desc: Naruto: Kakashi, O Guerreiro Sharingan

programme.title: Planeta dos Tubares, (2016, Supernatural Sci-Fi)

programme.title: Ces de Luta, (2013, Supernatural Sci-Fi)
programme.desc: Na tradio de UNDERWORLD e DISTRICT 9, toda Manhattan fica em quarentena quando o vrus Lupin se espalha como fogo, transformando civis inocentes em lobos vorazes. Nada menos que uma exploso nuclear pode parar o vrus monstruoso.

programme.title: Tubaro De Malibu, (2009, Action)
programme.desc: Em Malibu, um tsunami provoca o reaparecimento de uma espcie pr-histrica de tubaro, que se acreditava estar extinta e que se dedica a atacar os banhistas.

programme.title: O ltimo Dia, (2016, Science fiction)

programme.title: O Legado de Osiris, (2017, Action)
programme.desc: Situado no futuro em uma poca de colonizao interplanetria, um par improvvel corre contra uma crise global iminente e confrontado pelos monstros que vivem dentro de todos ns.

programme.title: A Tumba do Diabo, (2009, Sci-Fi Horror)
programme.desc: Sob o comando do veterano de guerra Mack , um grupo de mercenrios contratado pela CIA com a misso de resgatar um cientista, que trabalha em uma descoberta arqueolgica, no deserto do Oriente Mdio.

programme.title: Tempestade de Gelo, (2023, Action)
programme.desc: Quando uma tempestade de inverno atinge a Carolina do Norte com a menor temperatura j registrada na histria, os climatologistas comeam uma corrida contra o tempo para salvar o mximo de vidas possveis antes que o pas inteiro vire gelo.

programme.title: A Era da Escurido, (2021, Action)
programme.desc: No sculo 23, o Major Mitch Hunter (Jane) lidera uma luta contra um exrcito de necromutantes que habitam o submundo.

programme.title: Misso: Pandora, (2022, Action)
programme.desc: Aps receber um pedido de socorro de uma embarcao, a Fora Espacial Americana envia uma nave de resgate at Pandora, uma das luas de Saturno. Mas ao tentarem pousar, a tripulao descobre que o local habitado por uma raa altamente evoluda.

programme.title: Hitman - O Rei dos Assassinos, (1998, Action)
programme.desc: Um antigo chefe da mfia japonesa suspeita de ser vtima de um ataque e deixa uma recompensa para a pessoa que encontrar o seu assassino.

programme.title: City Hunter: O Caador de Encrenca, (1993, Comedy)
programme.desc: Ryu Saeba, detetive particular, busca a filha fugitiva de um empresrio em um navio cruzeiro sequestrado por bandidos.

programme.title: Tormenta, (1996, Drama)
programme.desc: Em 1961, adolescentes viajam no "Albatroz", um navio-escola com um capito severo.O medo inicial se transforma em respeito, mas uma tragdia pode ameaar essa confiana.

programme.title: O Preo da Traio, (1996, Thriller)
programme.desc: Uma mulher chamada Allison Pond encontrada morta no deserto perto de Los Angeles.Um detetive investiga o caso e descobre que ela poderia estar ligada a um programa militar secreto.Porm, ele tambm guarda segredos: ela era sua amante.

programme.title: Caadores de Emoo, (1991, Action)
programme.desc: Johnny Utah, um jovem agente do FBI, se infiltra em crculos de surf para desmascarar uma gangue de ladres que, como marca registrada, usam mscaras de presidentes dos Estados Unidos durante seus golpes.

programme.title: O Legionrio, (1998, Action)

programme.title: Corao de Drago, (1985, Action)
programme.desc: Um policial (Jackie Chan) tem a difcil tarefa de cuidar do seu irmo deficiente mental, Sammo. Quando Sammo, acidentalmente se envolve num roubo, ele sequestrado por bandidos e Jackie, tem que salv-lo.

programme.title: Outubro Negro, (1991, Action)
programme.desc: Jornalista americano viaja para Israel com o intuito de investigar a morte de oito fuzileiros navais, vtimas de um ataque terrorista. Mas ele acaba descobrindo que muito mais coisas se escondem por trs do incidente e sua vida passa a correr perigo.

programme.title: A Fria do Protetor, (1985, Action)

programme.title: A rvore Da Vida, (2011, Drama)

programme.title: O Melhor Ladro do Mundo, (2005, Drama)
programme.desc: Depois que o marido tem um derrame, Sue Zaidman passa a ser a nica provedora de sua famlia. Ela enfrenta uma fase difcil e turbulenta, e tem que se impor para lidar com os filhos e manter-se firme apesar das adversidades.

programme.title: Prisioneiras Nunca Mais, (2021, Thriller)
programme.desc: Inspirada em acontecimentos reais, Prisioneiras Nunca Mais conta a histria de Aggie, em busca de suas duas afilhadas, sequestradas pelo pai para serem vendidas como escravas. O filme um drama sobre a realidade do trfico humano.

programme.desc: Estrelando Mary J. Blige e Angela Bassett. Coretta Scott King e a Dra. Betty Shabazz, esposas do Dr. Martin Luther King e de Malcolm X, devem continuar suas vidas como mes solteiras aps o assassinato de seus maridos.

programme.title: Poder Alm da Vida, (2006, Drama)
programme.desc: Dan Millman um atleta que tem dinheiro, mulheres perseguindo-o e aptides para participar das Olimpadas. Mas um encontro com Scrates, um homem que questiona tudo, faz sua viso de mundo mudar completamente.

programme.title: O Amor Nunca Morre, (2010, Drama)
programme.desc: Depois de anos afastado dos amigos e familiares, produtor musical com a vida pessoal e profissional em frangalhos volta para casa na Carolina do Norte para cuidar do pai doente, num difcil reencontro com questes do passado.

programme.title: Procura da Liberdade, (2021, Drama)
programme.desc: Dois homens separados por 100 anos esto unidos em sua busca pela liberdade. Em 1856, um escravo, Samuel Woodward e sua famlia, escapam da Plantao Monroe perto de Richmond, Virgnia.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Formao! A Nova Equipe Kakashi

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Uma Adio Indesejada

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Falso Sorriso

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Sem Ttulo
programme.desc: Temari encontra Kakashi e sua equipe. Naruto explode de raiva pelos Akatsuki. Como tambm hospeda uma besta de cauda dentro de si, Naruto entende o que Gaara est sofrendo. Kankuro infectado por um veneno. Sem um antdoto, ele ter poucos dias de vida.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Simulao
programme.desc: Chega uma mensagem da Aldeia da Areia sobre o sequestro do Kazekage. Tsunade manda a equipe Kakashi para a aldeia. Kankuro comea a batalha contra os Akatsuki, mas as tticas dos bonecos no funcionam. Seu oponente foi quem desenvolveu essas tticas.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Ponte Tenchi

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: As Lgrimas De Sakura

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Segredo Da Batalha

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: As Consequncias Da Traio
programme.desc: Kisame e Itachi parecem ter sido clones cujos poderes foram copiados por um jutsu de personificao. Vov Chiyo explica a conexo entre a besta de cauda e o jinchuriki. Sakura percebe que Naruto enfrenta o mesmo destino e lgrimas escorrem em seu rosto.

programme.desc: A new father struggling with fatigue, emotional insecurities, and a failing marriage joins a dating app, only to swipe right on what may be an inhuman presence.

programme.title: Let Me In, (2011, Vampires)
programme.desc: Owen, an overlooked and bullied boy, finds love and revenge through Abby (Chlo Grace Moretz of KICK-ASS), a beautiful but peculiar girl who turns out to be a vampire.

programme.title: Spell, (2019, Supernatural Horror)

programme.title: The Innkeepers, (2011, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: After over one hundred years of service, The Yankee Pedlar Inn is shutting its doors for good. The last remaining employees - Claire and Luke - are determined to uncover proof of what many believe to be one of New England's most haunted hotels.

programme.title: Scream, (1996, Horror)
programme.desc: After a series of mysterious deaths, an offbeat group of scary movie fans become the target of a masked killer in this smash-hit thriller from legendary director Wes Craven (A NIGHTMARE ON ELM STREET) that breathed new life into the horror genre.

programme.title: Scream 2, (1997, Horror)
programme.desc: While away at college, Sidney Prescott thought she'd finally put the terror behind her...until a copycat killer begins acting out a real-life sequel in which no one is safe, or beyond suspicion.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: The Nijimura Brothers, Part 3
programme.desc: After defeating Keicho, Koichi insists they find the bow and arrow and destroy it. Josuke agrees, but when the two enter the attic where the bow and arrow are being kept, they hear an inhuman noise inside.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Koichi Hirose (Reverb)
programme.desc: On his way to school, Koichi finds himself blackmailed by a man named Tamami Kobayashi, who frames him for running over a cat. A panicked Koichi starts to feel guilty for his actions when suddenly a giant lock appears on his chest!

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Toshikazu Hazamada (Show Off)
programme.desc: Josuke and Koichi get info that a student at their school, Toshikazu Hazamada may be a Stand user and decide to look into the case. Their suspicions are quickly confirmed after Hazamadas wooden doll morphs into an exact copy of Josuke and attacks them.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Yukako Yamagishi Falls in Love, Part 1
programme.desc: Koichi is both surprised and excited when a girl named Yukako Yamagishi says she likes him. But Koichis joy quickly turns into fear after Yukako begins to express her love for him in very erratic and dangerous ways.
programme.sub-title: Yukako Yamagishi Falls in Love, Part 1

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Yukako Yamagishi Falls in Love, Part 2
programme.desc: Yukakos dangerous obsession with reshaping Koichi into a man fit for her gets worse, prompting Koichi to hatch an escape plan. He tries to call Josuke for help using a nearby pay phone but is stopped by Yukako, who anticipated his move.
programme.sub-title: Yukako Yamagishi Falls in Love, Part 2

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Lets Go Eat Some Italian Food
programme.desc: Josuke and Okuyasu come across an Italian restaurant owned by an Italian chef named Tonio. When Okuyasu asks for the menu, Tonio explains that he decides the menu on the spot based on the customer he sees.
programme.sub-title: Lets Go Eat Some Italian Food

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Chili Pepper, Part 1
programme.desc: Chili Pepper suddenly appears before Josuke to test his Stand powers. Josuke puts up a fight but is overwhelmed by Chili Peppers power. The next day, Josuke and friends learn from Jotaro that a man who can locate Chili Pepper is heading to Morioh

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Gon and Killua decide to join Kite and his team in their research mission gathering information on the Chimera Ants.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Kite has narrowed down the location of the Chimera Ants.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Gon and his friends enter the NGL. Meanwhile, the Chimera Ants have started going through surprising changes.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: The situation worsens, and Gon and his friends receive Ponzu's message.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Gon and his friends come face-to-face with Chimera Ants for the first time and are frightened by their speed and power.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: The Chimera Ants become increasingly vicious after eating the members of the NGL underground.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: The Hunter Association sets out to eliminate the Chimera Ants.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter: A x Fated x Awakening
programme.desc: Hagya attacks Gon, Killua and Kite. Meanwhile, the first of the Queen's Royal Guards is about to be born.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Kite, Gon and Killua continue using Nen to follow Hagya to the Chimera Ant's nest.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Gon and Killua vow to get stronger so they can return and rescue Kite.

programme.title: Death Note: Overcast
programme.desc: Light uses the Death Note to try to get rid of the woman who could get him captured, and is shocked when it doesn't work.

programme.title: Death Note: Glare
programme.desc: L insists on setting up bugs and cameras in the homes of Chief Yagami and Deputy Director Kitamura.

programme.title: Death Note: Encounter
programme.desc: The murders continue, and L grows suspicious of Light's too perfect behavior and decides to investigate him on his own.

programme.title: Death Note: Doubt

programme.title: Death Note: Assault
programme.desc: As predicted on the tapes sent to Sakura TV, news anchors and commentators who expressed doubt about Kira die one by one.

programme.desc: Josuke and his friends gather at the Port to try and reach Joseph Joestar before Chili Pepper. Speculating the enemy is hiding nearby, Jotaro orders Josuke and Koichi to stay behind and find Chili Peppers user while he and Okuyasu go protect Joseph.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: We Picked Up Something Crazy!

programme.desc: Koichi and Hazamada visit the home of Rohan Kishibe, a popular manga artist whom they are huge fans of. Much to their joy, Rohan not only agrees to sign autographs but also invites them to take a tour of his workspace.
programme.sub-title: Let's Go to the Manga Artist's House, Part 1

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Let's Go to the Manga Artist's House, Part 2
programme.desc: Koichi is drawn back to Rohans house, where he sees the manga artist finishing up his next manga at an incredible speed. Rohan uses his stand Heavens Door on Koichi again to gain further creative inspiration from the young boys life experience.
programme.sub-title: Let's Go to the Manga Artist's House, Part 2

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Let's Go Hunting!

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Rohan Kishibe's Adventure
programme.desc: Koichi and Rohan discover a small alley that does not appear to be listed anywhere on the map. The two decide to go into the alley to see where it leads but soon find themselves walking around in circles and unable to get out.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Shigechi's Harvest, Part 1
programme.desc: Josuke and Okuyasu become friends with a Stand user named Shigekiyo Yangu, a.k.a. Shigechi, who can use his Stand to find and collect the money that is scattered across town. Impressed by the boys abilities.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Shigechi's Harvest, Part 2

programme.sub-title: Return To Lonesome Dove: Part II - The Forge

programme.title: Swingers, (1996, Screwball)
programme.desc: In this laugh-out-loud indie comedy classic that launched the careers of its outstanding cast, two friends set out to rewrite modern dating from Los Angeles to Las Vegas.

programme.title: Ghost World, (2001, Romance)
programme.desc: The story of neo-cool Enid and Rebecca who, faced with graduation from high school take a hard look at the world they wryly observe. When Rebecca focuses her attention on mutual romantic fixation Josh, the girls friendship is forever changed.

programme.title: Party Girl, (1995, Drama)

programme.title: Piranha, (1978, Cult Horror)
programme.desc: When flesh-eating piranhas are accidentally released into a summer resort's rivers, the guests become their next meal.

programme.title: Prozac Nation, (2001, Drama)
programme.desc: A talented young writer struggles with self-destructive behavior and paralyzing depression during her first year at Harvard. Featuring an all-star cast including Christina Ricci, Anne Heche and Michelle Williams.

programme.title: Pumping Iron, (1977, Documentary)
programme.desc: Scripted documentary following Arnold Schwarzenegger as he attempts to defend his bodybuilding title against several competitors.

programme.title: Punisher: War Zone, (2008, Comic Books and Superheroes)
programme.desc: Continuing his crusade to punish violent criminals in America, former FBI agent Frank Castle arrives in New York to take on a scarred villain who plots to take control of the underworld.

programme.title: Texas Chainsaw, (1970, Horror Classics)
programme.desc: A young woman inherits an isolated mansion from a distant relative, but an unspeakable horror awaits her in the mansion's dank cellars.

programme.title: The Amityville Horror, (1979, Horror Classics)

programme.title: House (1985), (1986, Cult Horror)

programme.title: Friday the 13th Part II, (1981, Horror)
programme.desc: Five years after the bloodbath at Camp Crystal, all that remains is the legend of Jason and his demented mother, who had murdered seven camp counsellors. At a nearby summer camp, the new counsellors are unconcerned about the warnings to stay away.

programme.title: Friday the 13th - Part III, (1982, Horror)

programme.title: Friday the 13th Part V: A New Beginning, (1985, Horror)

programme.title: Friday the 13th Part VII: The New Blood, (1988, Horror)

programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Pandemonium! The Monster Snake, Shogun Orochi!

programme.title: In order to save her child attendant Toko, the top Oiran Komurasaki stands up to the Shogun Orochi, but the yakuza boss Kyoshiro interrupts and does something that no one expected.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Flower Falls! The Final Moment of the Most Beautiful Woman in the Land of Wano!

programme.title: Nami, Robin, and the others got away from Oden's Castle and now discuss what they have found out about the enemy so far. Meanwhile, Chopper's group sets off to rescue Luffy from the Excavation Labor Camp.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Bond Between Prisoners! Luffy and Old Man Hyo!

programme.title: At the Excavation Labor Camp in Udon, Luffy tries to save Old Man Hyo and stands up to Vice Warden Daifuku and Warden Babanuki with his physical strength weakened by the Sea Prism Stone cuffs.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Lead Performer! Queen the Plague Emerges!

programme.title: Luffy and Old Man Hyo try to climb up the wall and break out of the Excavation Labor Camp, but Queen the Plague stands in their way and gives them a hard time!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Luffy fights quite a few Queen's men at once in the deadly sumo match while protecting Old Man Hyo! Meanwhile, Nami, Robin, and Shinobu are cornered as Hawkins comes to raid the bathhouse.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Dead or Alive! Queen's Sumo Inferno!

programme.title: Luffy deals with the endless supply of opponents trying to figure out the way to use Haki that Rayleigh taught him a while ago. Meanwhile, Zoro faces Gyukimaru who is accusing him of stealing Shusui.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Gyukimaru! Zoro Fights a Duel on Bandit's Bridge!

programme.title: The duel between Zoro and Gyukimaru is interrupted by Kamazo, Orochi's assassin who came after a little girl Toko. Without Shusui, Zoro has a hard time fighting the two at the same time, but he finds an unlikely third sword to take down the enemies.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Big Turnover! The Three-Sword Style Overcomes Danger!

programme.title: Luffy's next enemies in the deadly sumo match in the Excavation Labor Camp are two tough Gifters. Much to Old Man Hyo's surprise, Luffy keeps practicing using Haki properly at the same time as he fights them.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Zoro, Stunned! The Shocking Identity of the Mysterious Woman!

programme.title: Hiyori tells Zoro a stunning story of escaping the incident 20 years ago and surviving until the present day. Meanwhile, Luffy stills struggles to master the Haki of the Color of Arms, but a surprising person steps up and gives an example.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Get the Hang of It! The Land of Wano's Haki - Ryuo!

programme.title: Luffy continues training himself to use Haki with Old Man Hyo's help, but the battle is suddenly suspended and shortly thereafter Raizo appears in front of them. Meanwhile, Nami, Usopp, and the others are wondering who Tonoyasu really is.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Ushimitsu Kozo the great thief who robbed from the rich and gave to the poor gets caught and his true identity stuns Orochi and the others. When Toko hears the news, she gets very upset and so is Zoro when he hears the reason.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Shaking the Nation! The Identity of Ushimitsu Kozo The Chivalrous Thief!

programme.title: Tonoyasu has been strung up and is soon-to-be executed. The people of the Land of Wano recognize who he really is and start raising their voice while the Straw Hats rush to save him. Then, Tonoyasu starts addressing the nation.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Straw Hats Run! Save the Captive Tonoyasu!

programme.title: By the time Kin'emon and the others notice that Yasuie is trying to sacrifice his life to save their raid plan, it was all too late. Ebisu Town's people laughing out loud annoys Zoro, but when Hiyori tells him the reason behind it, he is in for a shock!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Zoro's Fury! The Truth About the Smile!

programme.title: Hiyori and Shinobu tearfully tell the Straw Hats the truth behind Ebisu Town residents' cheerfulness and smiles, which infuriates them. When Yasuie's daughter, Toko, runs to her father's body, Orochi recognizes who she is and takes a shot at her!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Zoro and Sanji start fighting against Orochi's clan. Nami and the rest of the Straw Hats join them. Meanwhile, at the Excavation Labor Camp, a new criminal, Hitokiri Kamazo, has arrived.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Straw Hats Step In! An Uproarious Deadly Battle at the Execution Ground!

programme.title: Zoro keeps fighting Kyoshiro, but Orochi's Oniwabanshu comes to back Kyoshiro up. Meanwhile, at the Excavation Labor Camp, Queen announces the restart of the Sumo Inferno with a new cruel rule.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Luffy's Determination! Win Through the Sumo Inferno!

programme.title: Kin'emon apologizes Ashura Doji AKA Shutenmaru for goading Holdem to attack Atamayama where Ashura's hideout was located, and asks him to join the fight against Kaido. Meanwhile, Chopper and his group finally arrived at the Excavation Labor Camp!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Storm Has Come! A Raging Big Mom!

programme.title: Craving red-bean soup, Big Mom attacks Queen, the Animal Kingdom Pirates' Lead Performer who reins over Udon. However, when she finds out that the pot is empty, she turns her wrath against the one who ate it all: Luffy.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Grudge Over Red-bean Soup! Luffy Gets into a Desperate Situation!

programme.title: After finding out that Luffy ate the whole pot ofthe red-bean soup that she was looking for, Big Mom becomes infuriated and goesafter him. Meanwhile, Queen, the Lead Performer, comes up with a plan to stopthe rampaging Big Mom.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Stop the Emperor of the Sea! Queen's Secret Plan!

programme.title: Queen hastily ties up the sleeping Big Mom and carries her to Onigashima leaving Udon to Babanuki. Babanuki uses a weapon that Queen made to threaten inmates and make them catch Luffy, but a mysterious figure emerges from the forbidden cell to save Luffy.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Brutal Ammunition! The Plague Rounds Aim at Luffy!

programme.title: Kawamatsu the Kappa is freed and stands up against Babanuki and his underlings! Listening to Old Man Hyo's suggestion, Raizo and Kiku reveal their true identities which give the desperate prisoners not only a shock but also some hope.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Start Fighting Back! Luffy and the Akazaya Samurai!

programme.title: Luffy faces those who are infected by the Plague Rounds and the non-infected prisoners who submit to the authority of Udon. To open their eyes, Luffy takes a measure that will risk his life. However, the Chief Warden Babanuki has something up his sleeve.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Were Here to Win! Luffy's Desperate Scream!

programme.title: The freed prisoners in Udon refuse to fight alongside Luffy because he is a pirate. Raizo and Old Man Hyo try their best to convince them, but an unexpected person stands up to bring the prisoners hope after taking down Kaido!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Warriors' Dream! Luffy's Conquer of Udon!

programme.title: After standing against Orochi, Zoro and Hiyori are chased by Orochi's ninja group. Meanwhile, Orochi is told that they captured Trafalgar Law as the people of the Flower Capital prepare for the upcoming Fire Festival.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Orochi's Hunting Party! The Ninja Group vs. Zoro!

programme.title: Nami and Franky join Kanjuro who has taken Yasuie's dead body to bury him with Oden, and together they hit the road. Robin, Usopp, and Brook are at the dock trying to figure out a way to pass through a check point.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Tension Rises in Onigashima! Two Emperors of the Sea Meet?!

programme.title: As the clash between Kaido and Big Mom continues, Queen looks for a way to get out of Onigashima. Meanwhile in Udon, Old Man Hyo finds his former allies, four bosses from each region.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Hiyori's Confession! A Reunion at Bandit's Bridge!

programme.title: Zoro runs after the warrior-monk who took his Shusui and Kawamatsu shares with Hiyori his memory of a fox that was guarding the graves in Ringo. As they catch up to Zoro, they find a room filled with swords.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Its Name is Enma! Oden's Great Swords!

programme.title: As the day of the raid approaches, Law finds someone who might help him escape the prison and Kin'emon gathers up most of his main allies to discuss the raid plan. Meanwhile, at Onigashima, Kaido and Big Mom make a stunning declaration!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A New Alliance?! Kaidos Army Gathers!

programme.title: Kin'emon, Momonosuke, and the others can't fight back tears when they hear that Hiyori is alive. Zoro is stunned by Enma's demonic power and its ties to him.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Ticking Down to the Great Battle! The Straw Hats Go into Combat Mode!

programme.title: The resolution that passed the Reverie and the incidents surrounding the conference stun people all over the world and corner the Seven Warlords of the Sea. Meanwhile, a Navy captain Koby secretly contacts someone who is currently in the Land of Wano.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Big News! An Incident That Will Affect the Seven Warlords!

programme.title: Admiral Issho and Fleet Admiral Sakazuki argue over the abolition of the Seven Warlord system and the alliance of the two Emperors of the Sea. Meanwhile, ex-Fleet Admiral Sengoku teaches the young Navy soldiers about the legendary Rocks Pirates.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Legendary Battle! Garp and Roger!

programme.title: The Core, (2003, Action)
programme.desc: The Earth has stopped rotating because of a change in the planet's core temperature. To restore the normal temperature, astronauts must travel to the center and detonate a nuclear bomb before the core superheats and destroys all life on the surface.

programme.title: A.I. Artificial Intelligence, (2001, Science fiction)
programme.desc: In a future world, humans share aspects of their lives with companion robots called Mechas. But when an advanced prototype robot child named David is programmed to show unconditional love, his human family isn't prepared for the consequences.

programme.title: Minority Report, (2002, Action)
programme.desc: In the future, a division of the police department has the technology to arrest killers before they commit crimes; however, the tables turn on one of the cops working within the division.

programme.title: War of the Worlds, (2005, Action)
programme.desc: A contemporary retelling of H.G.Wells' classic, the sci-fi thriller reveals the extraordinary battle for the future of humankind through the eyes of one American family.

programme.title: The Host, (2013, Science fiction)
programme.desc: When an unseen enemy threatens mankind by taking over humans' bodies and erasing their minds, Melanie Stryder risks everything to protect the people she cares about most, proving that love can conquer all in a dangerous new world.

programme.title: A.I. Artificial Intelligence, (2001, Science fiction)
programme.desc: In a future world, humans share aspects of their lives with companion robots called Mechas. But when an advanced prototype robot child named David is programmed to show unconditional love, his human family isn't prepared for the consequences.

programme.title: Minority Report, (2002, Action)
programme.desc: In the future, a division of the police department has the technology to arrest killers before they commit crimes; however, the tables turn on one of the cops working within the division.

programme.title: The Unforgiven, (1960, Western)
programme.desc: John Huston directs Audrey Hepburn in this thrilling, romantic western about a woman who becomes the target of lawless racism and brutality when it is discovered that she was born to the Kiowa tribe but secretly adopted by a white frontier family.

programme.title: Support Your Local Sheriff!, (1969, Western)
programme.desc: James Garner stars in this rollicking western spoof that has him taking on the job of a frontier town sheriff who must fend off villains (led by Walter Brennen) from every direction...all without breaking a sweat or dirtying his shiny black boots!

programme.title: Support Your Local Gunfighter, (1971, Western)
programme.desc: James Garner is back in the saddle again as hustler Latigo Smith whose latest con is passing off cowhand Jug (Jack Elam) as the dreaded gunman Swifty Morgan. But when the real Swifty shows up, the Wild West is going to get a whole lot wackier!

programme.title: Hour Of The Gun, (1967, Western)
programme.desc: Director John Sturges presents a reworking of the Wyatt Earp/Doc Holliday legend and the struggle for political control of Tombstone, with a marvelous trio of antagonists: James Garner as Earp, Jason Robards as Holliday, and Robert Ryan as Clanton.

programme.title: Warlock, (1959, Western)
programme.desc: An ex-outlaw (Richard Widmark) divides and challenges a quick-draw lawman (Henry Fonda) and his sidekick (Anthony Quinn).

programme.title: Twilight On The Rio Grande, (1947, Western)
programme.desc: Gene Autry's investigation of the murder of his partner, leads him to Mexico, where he becomes involved with the beautiful singer whose father has also been killed, and finds a jewelry smuggling ring.

programme.title: Loaded Pistols, (1949, Western)
programme.desc: Seeking a man who has killed his best friend in a poker game, Gene Autry finds a cowboy hiding from a posse. The young man's gun is the murder weapon yet Gene is convinced of his innocence.

programme.title: The Deadly Companions, (1962, Western)
programme.desc: An ex-army officer accidentally kills a woman's son and tries to make up for it by escorting the funeral procession through dangerous Indian territory.

programme.title: Invitation to a Gunfighter, (1964, Western)
programme.desc: Screen legend Yul Brynner turns in a magnificent performance as a gunfighter who must do battle with his most formidable adversary - his own conscience - in this gripping, double-barreled western full of surprise twists and colorful villainy.

programme.title: Adaptation, (2002, Comedy)
programme.desc: Director Spike Jonze delivers a stunningly original comedy that seamlessly blends fictional characters and situations with the lives of real people. As Charlie struggles to adapt Orlean's best-selling book "The Orchid Thief".Rated: R

programme.title: How to Lose a Guy in 10 Days, (2003, Romance)
programme.desc: A "How to..." columnist agrees to write a first-hand account about what it takes to drive a man out of your life... in exactly 10 days.

programme.title: The Fighting Temptations, (2003, Musical)
programme.desc: To collect his aunt's inheritance, an unemployed man (Cuba Gooding Jr.) must form a gospel choir and lead it to success.

programme.title: Catch and Release, (2007, Comedy)
programme.desc: Gray Wheeler just lost everything. But it could be the best thing that ever happened to her. After the death of her fianc, Gray moves in with her late love's best friends. While Sam and Dennis do their best to cheer Gray up. Rated: PG-13

programme.desc: A "How to..." columnist agrees to write a first-hand account about what it takes to drive a man out of your life... in exactly 10 days.

programme.desc: To collect his aunt's inheritance, an unemployed man (Cuba Gooding Jr.) must form a gospel choir and lead it to success.

programme.desc: A love story about a British boy and an American girl set against the backdrop of the social upheaval of the 1960s.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Chibi-Usa leaves the house after being scolded by Usagi. Chibi-Usa begins to cry, which draws the attention of Rubeus and the Four Spectre Sisters.
programme.sub-title: Protect Chibi-Usa: Clash of the Ten Warriors

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Mamoru has a dream which a voice warns him that being with Usagi will bring her great misfortune. Meanwhile, Sailor Moon is attacked by a Droid.
programme.sub-title: Awaken the Sleeping Beauty: Mamoru's Distress

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Wiseman predicts that Chibi-Usa will appear at Hikawa Shrine. Learning of this, Rubeus orders Koan to go down there and eliminate their target.
programme.sub-title: Battle of the Flames of Love! Mars vs. Koan

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Ami enters the World Chess Tournament, but Bertheir is also there, forcing Ami to transform and reveal her identity as a Sailor Guardian to the enemy.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Rubeus gives Petz and Calaveras one last chance to eliminate Rabbit and the Sailor Guardians once and for all.
programme.sub-title: Rubeus the Heartless: The Tragic Sisters

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Chibi-Usa learns that Usagi is Sailor Moon. Eager to return to the future, she steals Usagi's Silver Crystal and flees, only to be ambushed by Rubeus.
programme.sub-title: A UFO Appears: The Sailor Guardians Abducted

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Rubeus succeeds in taking four of the five Sailor Guardians prisoner. He demands that Sailor Moon bring Chibi-Usa and the Silver Crystal to him.
programme.sub-title: Defeat Rubeus: The Battle in Space

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Chibi-Usa falls into a coma. Usagi and the others are at a loss, when a Sailor Guardian calling herself Sailor Pluto suddenly appears before them.
programme.sub-title: The Mysterious New Guardian: Sailor Pluto Appears

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The Black Moon clan sends down its next operative, Esmeraude, to open the Dark Gate in 20th century Tokyo.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi is still depressed over Mamoru calling off their relationship. Ami and Mako try to cheer her up by taking Usagi to a promise ring workshop.
programme.sub-title: Shared Feelings: Usagi and Mamoru in Love Once Again

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: A strange new flu is causing everyone to get sick, including the Sailor Guardians. Minako takes it upon herself to look after her sick friends.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Artemis is out to prove he is capable after being teased by Luna. He encounters a suspicious-looking man who is gathering stray animals.
programme.sub-title: Artemis's Adventure: The Monster Animal Kingdom

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The school test results are posted, and Ami is at the top of her class. She finds herself becoming isolated after rumors that she cheated on the test.
programme.sub-title: The Terrifying Illusion: Ami All Alone

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: After being out sick, Chibi-Usa returns to school eager to see her friends. But to her surprise, her friends and teachers begin attacking her.
programme.sub-title: The Dark Gate Is Completed? The Targeted Elementary School

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Chibi-Usa decides to return to save her mother. With support from the Sailor Guardians and Tuxedo Mask, she opens the Door of Space and Time.
programme.sub-title: Journey to the Future: Battle in the Space-Time Corridor

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Arriving in the future, the Sailor Guardians stand in shock as they see the ruins of what used to be Crystal Tokyo.
programme.sub-title: The Shocking Future: Dimande's Dark Ambition

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Tuxedo Mask rescues Sailor Moon from Black Moons castle. But before they can all celebrate, a giant dragon appears to destroy the Crystal Palace.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Wiseman brainwashes Chibi-Usa and turns her into the Dark Queen. The Sailor Guardians return to present-day Earth to find her.
programme.sub-title: The Dark Queen: Birth of Black Lady

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Saphir learns of Wisemans true intentions and tries to warn his brother, only to be attacked by Wiseman himself.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The appearance of the giant Malefic Black Crystal Tower is wreaking havoc. Sailor Moon and the Guardians enter the tower to put an end to this.
programme.sub-title: Believing in Love and the Future: Usagi's Decision

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The Dark Gate opens, and Dark Energy spreads everywhere. To stop this, the Sailor Guardians must defeat Black Lady.
programme.sub-title: The Final Battle Between Light and Dark: Pledge of Love for the Future

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Peace has returned, and the Sailor Guardians take a moment to look back at their past battles as they prepare for their next challenge.
programme.sub-title: Usagi and the Girls' Resolve: Prelude to a New Battle

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: A new enemy called the Death Busters appears, whose members aim to get their hands on the talismans that can only be found in pure-hearted humans.
programme.sub-title: Premonition of the Apocalypse: The Mysterious New Guardians Appear

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The Silver Crystal loses its shine and that means Usagi cannot transform. Mamoru tries to cheer Usagi up.
programme.sub-title: The Rod of Love is Born: Usagi's New Transformation

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and Minako sneak off to the arcade to take a break. The girls are approached by a handsome student named Haruka Tenoh, who wishes to join them.
programme.sub-title: A Handsome Boy? Haruka Tenoh's Secret

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi asks her friends to help her become a better person worthy of being Mamorus bride.
programme.sub-title: Usagi's Idol: The Graceful Genius Michiru

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Motokis little sister Unazuki is a pure-hearted girl who dreams of sharing her first kiss with the person she truly loves.
programme.sub-title: Protect the Pure Heart: The Three-Way Battle

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: A small misunderstanding causes Umino and Naru to believe that the other is no longer interested in them.
programme.sub-title: Let Moon Help with Your Love Problems

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Kaolinite has a new target: Makoto. When Haruka and Michiru find out, they decide to use Makoto as bait in order to obtain her talisman.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Kaolinite sets her eyes on Ami, believing that the famous girl genius would possess a pure heart full of confidence.
programme.sub-title: The Labyrinth of Water: Ami Targeted

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Realizing that the two mysterious Sailor Guardians Uranus and Neptune are also after the talismans, Kaolinite sends a Daimon to get rid of them.
programme.sub-title: To Save Our Friends: Moon and Uranus Join Forces

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Reis been spending the past several nights chanting to learn the meaning behind the strange nightmares shes been having.
programme.sub-title: A Man's Kindness: Yuichiro Heartbroken by Rei

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Seeing the happy couples around her, Minako starts questioning her life as a Sailor Guardian and the sacrifices she has to make.
programme.sub-title: I Want to Quit Being a Sailor Guardian: Minako's Dilemma

programme.title: The Foreigner, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: A businessman embarks on a revenge-fueled vendetta after his daughter dies in a terrorist bombing. His search leads to a cat-and-mouse conflict with a British government official whose past may hold the clues to the identities of the elusive killers.

programme.title: The Contractor, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: When his new assignment goes awry, an elite soldier finds himself hunted and on the run, caught in a dangerous conspiracy and fighting to stay alive long enough to get home and uncover the true motives of those who betrayed him.

programme.title: Rambo, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: John Rambo (Sylvester Stallone) calls upon his long-buried but lethal skills to rescue a missionary (Julie Benz) and her comrades from the Burmese army.

programme.title: Rambo: Last Blood, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: War veteran John Rambo tries to find some semblance of peace by raising horses on a ranch in Arizona. But when a vicious Mexican cartel kidnaps a teenage girl, Rambo embarks on a bloody and personal quest to rescue her and punish those responsible.

programme.title: The Foreigner, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: A businessman embarks on a revenge-fueled vendetta after his daughter dies in a terrorist bombing. His search leads to a cat-and-mouse conflict with a British government official whose past may hold the clues to the identities of the elusive killers.

programme.title: Conan the Barbarian, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: The Cimmerian warrior slashes his way across Hyboria on a mission that begins as a personal vendetta but turns into an epic battle against a supernatural evil.

programme.title: The Legend of Hercules, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Betrayed by his stepfather, the King, and exiled and sold into slavery because of a forbidden love, Hercules must use his formidable powers to fight his way back to his rightful kingdom.

programme.title: Solomon Kane, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: A man (James Purefoy) must renounce his newly taken vows of peace to rescue a young woman (Rachel Hurd-Wood) from an evil sorcerer (Jason Flemyng).

programme.title: Sem Lei, (2011)
programme.desc: 2011. Um grupo de trs amigos planeja um grande roubo que acaba dando errado quando um deles se revela um traidor. Enganado, Sonny decide assumir o problema de frente e busca vingana contra o antigo parceiro. Gneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Bruce, Phillippe, Ryan, Willis Diretor: Mike Gunther

programme.title: Alvo Duplo, (2012)
programme.desc: 2012. Dois caras dures e pertencentes a lados opostos da lei vo unir foras para dar um ponto final em uma onda de assassinatos brutais, mas a tarefa no ser nada fcil e muito sangue vai rolar. Gneros: Crime Elenco: Christian, Slater, Stallone, Sylvester Diretor: Walter Hill

programme.title: Ninja, (2010)
programme.desc: 2010. Casey um garoto apaixonado pela filosofia ninja, ele o leva ao Japo para estudar Ninjutsu. Sua instruo progride e seu sensei o envia para Nova York para proteger o lendrio Yoroi Bitsu, um ba blindado contendo as armas do ltimo Ninja Koga. Gneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Scott Adkins Tsuyoshi Ihara, Miki Hijii Diretor: Isaac Florentine

programme.title: O Guardio, (2010)
programme.desc: 2010. Um policial de Los Angeles voa para o Novo Mxico para trabalhar como guarda-costas para a filha de um poderoso empresrio. Quando gangsters a sequestram, ele os procura para resgat-la e proteg-la. Gneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Steven Seagal Diretor: Keoni Waxman

programme.title: Sem Lei, (2011)
programme.desc: 2011. Um grupo de trs amigos planeja um grande roubo que acaba dando errado quando um deles se revela um traidor. Enganado, Sonny decide assumir o problema de frente e busca vingana contra o antigo parceiro. Gneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Bruce, Phillippe, Ryan, Willis Diretor: Mike Gunther

programme.title: Inimigo em Casa, (2001)
programme.desc: 2001. Quando Danny testemunha o assassinato de um homem por seu padrasto Rick, o pai de Danny, Frank, precisa proteger seu filho do maior perigo. Gneros: Thriller Elenco: John Travolta, Vince Vaughn, Teri Polo Diretor: Harold Becker

programme.title: Outubro Negro, (1991)
programme.desc: 1991. Jornalista americano viaja para Israel com o intuito de investigar a morte de oito fuzileiros navais, vtimas de um ataque terrorista. Mas ele acaba descobrindo que muito mais coisas se escondem por trs do incidente e sua vida passa a correr perigo. Gneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Dolph Lundgren, Louis Gossett Jr., Lisa Berkley, John Finn, Gil Kopel, Howard Rypp, Ofer Lehavi, Zadok Zarum, Oren Neeman, Sharon Hacohen Diretor: Manny Coto

programme.title: Centurio, (2010)
programme.desc: 2010. O Imprio Romano controla do Egito Espanha, do leste at o Mar Negro. Entretanto ele enfrenta problemas no norte da Gr-Bretanha, devido s tticas de guerrilha usadas por seus inimigos. Gneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Andreas Wisniewski, Axelle Carolyn, Dave Legeno, David Morrissey, Dhaffer L Abidine, Dominic West, Jj Feild, Lee Ross. Diretor: Neil Marshall

programme.title: Perigo na Montanha, (2018)
programme.desc: 2018. Joe Braven um lenhador humilde que vive na fronteira dos Estados Unidos. Quando ele assaltado por um grupo de traficantes de drogas na cabana isolada onde ele mora, ele far tudo o que puder para proteger sua famlia. Gneros: Thriller Elenco: Jason Momoa, Garret Dillahunt, Jill Wagner, Glenn Ennis, Todd Scott, Stephen Lang, Sasha Rossof, Sala Baker, Fraser Aitcheson, Teach Grant Diretor: Lin Oeding

programme.title: Guerra nas ruas, (1969)
programme.desc: 1969. O passado de Black Ops de Kane est causando incerteza no futuro da equipe SIU. Gneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Steven Seagal, Sarah Lind Diretor: Keoni Waxman

programme.title: Ruslan-Vingana Explosiva, (2009)
programme.desc: 2009. Ruslan Drachev um ex-gangster que agora escreve romances criminais baseados em suas experincias. Ao visitar sua famlia ele descobre que sua filha est casando com o filho de um arqui-inimigo do mundo do crime. Gneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Steven Seagal Diretor: Jeff King

programme.title: Carga Explosiva 3, (2008)
programme.desc: 2008. Frank Martin obrigado a conduzir Valentina, a filha de Leonid Vasilev, o chefe da Agncia de Proteo Ambiental da Ucrnia, de Marselha a Odessa, alm de dois sacos de contedo suspeito. Gneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Jason Statham, Robert Knepper, Natalya Rudakova, Franois Berland, Jeroen Krabb, Alex Kobold, David Atrakchi, Yann Sundberg, Eriq Ebouaney, David Kammenos Diretor: Olivier Megaton

programme.title: Dose dupla, (2013)
programme.desc: 2013. Dois agentes especiais precisam se unir contra um cartel de drogas mexicano depois que uma operao secreta acaba gerando resultados catastrficos. Gneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Denzel Washington, Mark Wahlberg, Paula Patton Diretor: Baltasar Kormkur

programme.title: O Anjo da Morte, (2012)
programme.desc: 2012. Um policial disfarado se aproxima de seu inimigo. Ela decide deixar um agente de confiana entrar em campo, mas tem dvidas se ela tem o que preciso para completar a misso. Gneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Steven Seagal, Sarah Lind Diretor: Keoni Waxman

programme.title: O Alvo Final, (2010)

programme.desc: The Matchmaker must set a high bar to find a poly daughter a winning partner.

programme.title: The Wrong Life Coach
programme.desc: When Jordan gets a new boss, the job becomes more than she bargained for. She receives help in the form of a life coach named Liz, but this coach has plans of her own. Starring Vivica A. Fox, Morgan Bradley, Allison McAtee.

programme.title: My Mother Stole My Life
programme.desc: A woman steals her estranged daughters identity to escape from an abusive boyfriend. However, when he tracks her down, she finds herself in even more danger. Starring Patrice Goodman, Blaise Crocker, JaNae Armogan.

programme.title: The Integrity of Joseph Chambers
programme.desc: Fearing the apocalypse, an insurance salesman embarks on a solo hunting experiment, only to face a traumatic incident. Starring Clayne Crawford, Jordana Brewster, Colt Crawford.

programme.title: The Boy That Never Was
programme.desc: After their son is presumed dead in a Moroccan earthquake, a couples world is turned upside down when they spot a boy in Dublin, leading them on a desperate search for the truth.

programme.title: Heartland Homicide
programme.desc: Just outside Athens, Wis., Kenneth Kunz finds four of his family members murdered and one missing; investigators determine whether it was his mother, a local farm boy, or the rumored family drug dealing connections that led to the brutal slayings.

programme.title: Heartland Homicide
programme.desc: The chief of police in Sparta, Mich., leads an investigation into what happened to his family friend and babysitter, who is reported missing when she doesnt come home from Christmas shopping, and is found beneath a snow bank weeks later.

programme.title: Heartland Homicide
programme.desc: A young police officer discovers the dark secret hidden in a neighborhood restaurant.

programme.title: Almost Unsolved Heists
programme.desc: A perfect bank heist is pulled off by an underworld gang in Boston, Massachusetts; but when one criminal gets caught for an unrelated crime in another town, he starts sending threatening letters from jail asking for his cut.

programme.title: Raw Almond
programme.desc: A uniquely designed pop-up restaurant springs to life for 22 days amidst the frozen expanse of one of Canadas coldest provinces.

programme.title: Tuesday

programme.title: The Bernie Mac Show - Nut Job
programme.desc: Bernie enrolls the children in a myriad of activities, then discovers his Saturdays are at stake.

programme.title: The Bernie Mac Show - The Other Sister
programme.desc: Bernies sister wants to help raise her niece and nephew but squabbles with her brother over parenting methods.

programme.title: The Bernie Mac Show - Meet the Grandparents
programme.desc: Wandas parents take over the household during their visit.

programme.title: The Bernie Mac Show - For a Few Dollars More
programme.desc: Bernie bribes kids to attend Jordans birthday bash instead of another kids party that is slated for the same day.

programme.title: The Bernie Mac Show - Eye of the Tiger
programme.desc: Jordan tries out for the basketball team, but the coach decides he is better suited for gymnastics as a ribbon dancer.

programme.title: 6 Minutes to Glory: The HBCU Band Experience - HBCU All Star Battle of the Bands
programme.desc: Aspire TVs 6 Minutes to Glory brings six HBCU marching bands to the historic Battle of the Bands at Mercedes Benz Stadium in Atlanta; after months of practice and preparation, these performers are determined to leave their legacy on the field.

programme.title: Best Mattress Topper Ever!
programme.desc: Back Pain? Hip? Sleep well thanks to this cooling topper!

programme.title: The Journey to Joint Relief
programme.desc: Join John Walsh as he takes you on a captivating exploration of OmegaXL, a game-changing supplement that fights joint pain. Uncover the science and stories behind this powerful product, and find out how it can help you reclaim your life.

programme.title: Lung Cancer From Asbestos?
programme.desc: Have you or a loved one been diagnosed with lung cancer? You may be entitled to compensation!

programme.title: Protect Your Family from Identity Theft
programme.desc: Every 5 seconds theres a victim of identity theft. LifeLock helps alert you, restore your identity, and reimburse lost funds-leading the way in protecting families every day.

programme.title: The Aging Brain
programme.desc: Learn whats behind mental decline with age, and how to improve memory, focus and concentration with NeuroQs Darrin Peterson and Dale Bredesen MD.

programme.title: The Journey to Joint Relief
programme.desc: Join John Walsh as he takes you on a captivating exploration of OmegaXL, a game-changing supplement that fights joint pain. Uncover the science and stories behind this powerful product, and find out how it can help you reclaim your life.

programme.title: Protect Your Family from Identity Theft
programme.desc: Every 5 seconds theres a victim of identity theft. LifeLock helps alert you, restore your identity, and reimburse lost funds-leading the way in protecting families every day.

programme.title: The Journey to Joint Relief
programme.desc: Join John Walsh as he takes you on a captivating exploration of OmegaXL, a game-changing supplement that fights joint pain. Uncover the science and stories behind this powerful product, and find out how it can help you reclaim your life.

programme.title: Urban Indie Film Block - Uncomfortable Truths
programme.desc: Microaggression can kill.

programme.title: Style Kings - Your Style, Your Perspective
programme.desc: Justin is one of the top interior designers selected for an Atlanta show house; Dedrick hosts a dinner for a group of corporate clients hes known for years who have sought Dedricks expertise for suiting up in business.

programme.title: Style Kings - Creating and Celebrating Yourself
programme.desc: Dedrick helps client Donna celebrate her 60th birthday with a 60s themed custom party outfit; Justin scopes out a new design project for multi-hyphenate client Nicole who seeks to level up her lead bed/bath sanctuary.

programme.title: Style Kings - Style Kings #103
programme.desc: Style Kings is an intimate peek into a brotherhood of two experts who have open and honest conversations, sharing how their artistic minds shape their approach to fashion and design.

programme.title: Creative Collaborations - Creative Collaboration
programme.desc: Dedrick is tasked with creating legendary looks for TIs Atlanta Symphony Orchestra appearance; Justin goes through multiple iterations in achieving Nicoles desired look, but ultimately, the finished reveal is worth all the work.

programme.title: In Sickness and in Health
programme.desc: Faith falls ill two weeks before she is going to marry Norman; secrets start to flare up and the couple realizes that love and sacrifice go hand-in-hand.

programme.title: My Dads a Soccer Mom
programme.desc: Cut from his NFL football team, a man starts bonding with his young daughter (Skai Jackson) and encourages her to play soccer.

programme.title: Family Time - Its a Grey Area
programme.desc: Tony is upset when he discovers a grey hair and Lisa is amused.

programme.title: Family Time - The First Rule of Fight Night Is You Do Not Talk About Fight Night
programme.desc: Tony hosts fight night with his friends on the same night as Lisas dinner party.

programme.title: Family Time - The Will
programme.desc: Tony and Lisas family argue over who should take custody of their children if something happens to them.

programme.title: Family Time - No New Friends
programme.desc: When an old friend of Tonys moves into the neighborhood, the Stallworths realize things arent exactly as they seem.

programme.title: Family Time - Hospitality
programme.desc: Lisa invites Tonys godparents to stay for a few nights but no one can get them to leave.

programme.title: The Bernie Mac Show - Bar Mitzvah Crashers

programme.desc: An ex-Los Angeles detective (Andy Garcia) turns small-town policeman and falls for a blind woman (Uma Thurman) vulnerable to a killer.

programme.title: Eagle Eye (2008)
programme.desc: Two strangers (Shia LaBeouf, Michelle Monaghan) become pawns of a mysterious woman who threatens their friends and family and uses technology to control their actions.

programme.title: Road to Perdition (2002)
programme.desc: Accompanied by his eldest son, a Depression-era mob enforcer (Tom Hanks) seeks revenge after the rest of his family are murdered by his employers (Paul Newman) jealous son.

programme.title: The Firm (1993)
programme.desc: A law-school grad uncovers a sinister secret about the Tennessee firm that made him an offer he couldnt refuse.

programme.title: Valkyrie (2008)
programme.desc: Fearing that Hitler will destroy his beloved Germany, Col. Claus von Stauffenberg joins a group of high-ranking men who are plotting to assassinate him.

programme.title: The Right Stuff (1983)
programme.desc: The selection and training of the first U.S. astronauts take place amid political maneuvering and media hype.

programme.title: Vanished
programme.desc: Alice searches for her boyfriend Tom, uncovering secrets in his charity that make her question his past and what she thought she knew.

programme.title: The Hillside Strangler
programme.desc: Bianchis insanity plea collapses, and he flips on cousin Angelo Buono to avoid the death penalty; but as the trial becomes a media circus, Bianchis story keeps changing, forcing the district attorney to move to dismiss the case.

programme.title: Unprotected Sets
programme.desc: After her dreams of becoming a WNBA player are cut short by a tragic accident, Zainab Johnson finds her way to the stage, where her smart and edgy storytelling is informed by her experiences growing up in Harlem in an African-American Muslim family.

programme.title: Cinema Paradiso (1988)
programme.desc: A Sicilian boy (Salvatore Cascio) discovers the movies with his local theaters projectionist (Philippe Noiret).

programme.title: This is Christmas (2022)
programme.desc: Following Adam and Emma on their daily commute from the village of Langton to London, where they meet the same passengers every day.

programme.title: The Pink Panther Strikes Again (1976)
programme.desc: Inspector Clouseau (Peter Sellers) is on the trail of his ex-boss (Herbert Lom), who is out to destroy the world.

programme.title: Tank Girl (1995)
programme.desc: A renegade (Lori Petty) challenges the controller (Malcolm McDowell) of the worlds water supply on a post-apocalyptic desert Earth.

programme.title: She Rides Shotgun (2025)
programme.desc: Marked for death by unrelenting enemies, a newly released ex-con must protect his estranged 11-year-old daughter from a corrupt sheriff and a brutal gang leader wholl stop at nothing to protect his criminal interests.

programme.title: Navy SEALS (1990)
programme.desc: Sea/air/land commandos (Charlie Sheen, Michael Biehn) and a TV newswoman (Joanne Whalley-Kilmer) rescue hostages from terrorists armed with Stinger missiles.

programme.title: Vanished
programme.desc: Alice searches for her boyfriend Tom, uncovering secrets in his charity that make her question his past and what she thought she knew.

programme.title: The Running Man (1987)
programme.desc: A police-state scapegoat (Arnold Schwarzenegger) must play a TV hosts (Richard Dawson) deadly game show for the 21st-century masses.

programme.title: The Running Man (1987)
programme.desc: A police-state scapegoat (Arnold Schwarzenegger) must play a TV hosts (Richard Dawson) deadly game show for the 21st-century masses.

programme.title: Black Lotus (2023)
programme.desc: A soldier uses his military training to rescue the kidnapped daughter of his dead friend.

programme.title: The Yards (2000)
programme.desc: A friends lure of easy money draws an ex-con into the corrupt world of his uncles subway-train business.

programme.title: Changing Lanes (2002)
programme.desc: An attorney and a recovering alcoholic have a car accident which swiftly escalates into an ongoing, bitter feud.

programme.title: Camp X-Ray (2014)
programme.desc: A female guard (Kristen Stewart) at Guantanamo Bay forms an unlikely friendship with one of the facilitys longtime detainees.

programme.title: Boudica: Queen of War (2023)
programme.desc: Roman conquerors slay King Prasutagus, take away his children, and force his wife, Boudica, into subservience. Consumed by grief and a burning desire for justice, Boudica vows to reclaim her homeland from the clutches of the Romans.

programme.title: Bull (2021)
programme.desc: Ten years after he was last seen, a vicious mob enforcer returns home to find his son and methodically track down the gang that double-crossed him. His quest for revenge soon leads to a savage showdown between his wife and her mob boss father.

programme.title: The Last Manhunt (2022)
programme.desc: In 1909 Willie Boy and his love, Carlota, go on the run after he accidentally shoots her father in a confrontation gone terribly wrong. With President Taft coming to the area, the local sheriff leads two Native American trackers to hunt them down.

programme.title: Captive (2015)
programme.desc: Recovering drug addict Ashley Smith (Kate Mara) reads Rick Warrens "The Purpose Driven Life" as armed fugitive Brian Nichols (David Oyelowo) holds her hostage in her apartment.

programme.title: Star Trek: Nemesis (2002)
programme.desc: The crew (Jonathan Frakes, Brent Spiner) of the Enterprise must prevent a replica of Capt. Picard (Patrick Stewart) from overtaking Earth.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Raiders of the Lost Ark (1981)
programme.sub-title: Indiana Jones and the Raiders of the Lost Ark (1981)
programme.desc: Globe-trotting archaeologist Indiana Jones races the Nazis for possession of a legendary religious artifact.

programme.title: Serpico (1973)
programme.desc: Based on the true story of Frank Serpico, who sacrificed his career to expose widespread corruption in the NYPD.

programme.title: Cop Land (1997)
programme.desc: The sheriff (Sylvester Stallone) of a small New Jersey police community confronts key men (Harvey Keitel, Ray Liotta) on both sides of a law-enforcement cover-up.

programme.title: Heist 88 (2023)
programme.desc: A criminal mastermind decides to pull one last job before going to prison and recruits a group of young bank employees to steal millions in a daring and brazen assault on the U.S. banking system.

programme.title: Baby Driver (2017)
programme.desc: Coerced into working for a crime boss, a talented getaway driver must face the music when a doomed heist threatens his life, love and freedom.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Raiders of the Lost Ark (1981)
programme.sub-title: Indiana Jones and the Raiders of the Lost Ark (1981)
programme.desc: Globe-trotting archaeologist Indiana Jones races the Nazis for possession of a legendary religious artifact.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom (1984)
programme.sub-title: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom (1984)
programme.desc: In 1935 archaeologist Jones (Harrison Ford), a lounge singer (Kate Capshaw) and a Chinese orphan (Ke Huy Quan) search for mystical stones stolen from an Indian tribe.

programme.title: Top Gun (1986)
programme.desc: For Lieutenant Pete "Maverick" Mitchell and his friend and co-pilot Nick "Goose" Bradshaw, being accepted into an elite training school for fighter pilots is a dream come true. But a tragedy will threaten Petes dreams of becoming an ace pilot.

programme.title: The Sum of All Fears (2002)
programme.desc: Jack Ryan (Ben Affleck) and the CIA director (Morgan Freeman) try to stop terrorists who are planning a nuclear attack.

programme.title: The Painter (2024)
programme.desc: An ex-CIA operative is tracked down by a young woman and they become entangled in an unauthorized black ops program.

programme.title: Kindred (2025)
programme.desc: A pair of twisted, young criminals decide to break into a mansion for one big score, but they soon find out that the owners of the house are much more dangerous than they are.

programme.title: The Outlaws (2024)
programme.desc: A group of outlaws awaken to their empty train heist bag. Interrogations begin as each cowboy becomes the focus in an attempt to unmask the thief among them. Tensions mount as each bandit struggles to clear their name before bullets fly.

programme.title: The Godfather (1972)
programme.desc: Crime boss Vito Corleone and his sons, the ruthless yet loyal members of the Corleone family, rule their secretive New York empire with an iron fist.

programme.title: The Hunt for Red October (1990)
programme.desc: Moscow, Washington and a CIA analyst (Alec Baldwin) track a renegade Soviet captain (Sean Connery) and his new submarine.

programme.title: Deadlock (2021)
programme.desc: A retired Army ranger must save thousands of innocent lives when a rogue team of mercenaries brutally seizes an energy plant and holds everyone inside hostage.

programme.title: The Last Stop in Yuma County (2023)
programme.sub-title: The Last Stop in Yuma County (2023)
programme.desc: Stranded at an Arizona rest stop, a traveling knife salesman gets thrust into a high-stakes hostage situation by the arrival of two bank robbers who will stop at nothing to protect their ill-begotten fortune.

programme.title: Inside Angling
programme.desc: Tommo takes on the challenge of attempting to land a white marlin on spinning gear, casting soft plastic lures to these spectacular fish. The waters of Morocco teem with these amazing billfish for a few weeks of each year as they migrate past.

programme.title: Wild Fly
programme.desc: Still water trout fishing like youve never seen it before. We showcase the incredible cold waters of the Drakensberg Mountain region, where ferocious trout are lured to fast-moving surface frog patterns.
